General.Name: Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited
General.Description: Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited operates a hospital under the Vibhavadi Hospital name in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Hospital and Others. The company provides medical services; and rental services and space rental. In addition, it operates an anti aging center. Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: 51/3 Ngam Wong Wan Road, Bangkok, Thailand, 10900
